Name: NMC811 oxide production, for Li-ion battery | NMC811 oxide | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: NMC811 oxide is produced through a multi-step calcination process. NMC811 hydroxide and lithium hydroxide are mixed and heated in the calcination kiln over two or three rounds of mixing and calcination. The resulting material is crushed, sieved and demagnetized to obtain NMC811 oxide. The production process is completely automated and almost all electricity consumption is attributed to the calcination kiln.
